for_new_deployment.step_2: Update .chalice/policy-dev.json - replace account ID and region
for_new_deployment.step_3: Update environment variables in config.json for your DynamoDB tables
for_new_deployment.step_4: Run 'chalice deploy --stage dev' or your preferred stage

iam_policy_updates_required.account_id: Replace YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID with your AWS account ID
iam_policy_updates_required.region: Replace eu-west-1 with your AWS region
iam_policy_updates_required.table_names: Update DynamoDB table ARNs to match your table names
